Name: Livialle
Master Ability Effect:
Increase healing power (30) for self
Increase MAG (10%) for self
Short Character Overview(WIP): Livialle is a fairly decent MR, Blackmage and Arithmetician are the best PvE farming jobs. She got some decent damage and healing. Her use in PvP is limited, Blackmage is underwhelming and she has no access to cast time reduction and her Arith sub is missing the super important level Earthga. She can be played in a similar way to Ildyra and Leela, but shes quite weaker since its not her main Job.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Arithmetician
Passiv 1: Mag Up Lv. 1
Passiv 2: Level 4 to Level 3
Reactive: Damage Distribution

Name: Niv'Lu
Short Character Overview(WIP): Niv'Lu is the first unit to remove hate and physical barriers from the enemy. She offers a lot of different negative effects like disable and reduce def, as well as good damage and high range. She also can be used for quicken. She is the most versatile missle unit.
Recommended Build:
Sub: recommended Gunner, but any are usable
Passiv 1: Long range
Passiv 2: Sniper Mastery, but any passiv combination is possible
Reactive: Slow Counter

Name: Duane
Master Ability Effect:
10% HP for dark ally
15 dark atk for dark ally
10% atk for self
20 def pen for self
Short Character Overview(WIP): Duane is the only Unit to remove reraise so far and the only one to reduce dark res. He got high damage and fairly strong tankyness thanks to his high def. Additionally he got a strong aoe slash buff and disable. His res values are average. Even with his unqiue hate passiv he cant really be played as tank since he will loose aggro really fast and has no way to regain more hate. In short terms he is a utility bruiser who fits in almost every slash comb and plays especially well with Ruin Sterne.
Recommended Build:
Sub: recommended Viking, but every sub got its use
Passiv 1: Viking Lore
Passiv 2: recommended Knight hood, but every other passiv got its use
Reactive: Dragon's Blade

Name: Tyytas
Master Ability Effect:
10 Pierce Res
10 Missle res
25% decreased AP Cost
Short Character Overview(WIP): Tyytas is a very niche Tank. Since Slash and magic will always be the most common damage types and he got negative 20 slash and magic res he got very few spots to shine. He got decent 20 pierce res and incredible 45% missle res with Vikings passiv and hes only usable against those 2 damages. His MA makes taunting blade a bit cheaper which is nice.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Paladin
Passiv 1: Holy Knight's Protection (always)
Passiv 2: Viking Lore, Ap up or unyiedling protection depending on usage
Reactive: Paladin's Guard

Name: Mariale
Short Character Overview(WIP): Mariale is a fairly decent MR tank, positiv magic and missle res and neutral slashres. Thief lore gives her more agi and extra move which is super good. But MR stats make her not that strong for PvP. Shes also getting outclassed by most other MR tanks.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Spellblade
Passiv 1: Thief Lore
Passiv 2: Providence of Darkness
Reactive: Damage distribution

Name: Loreila
Short Character Overview(WIP): Loreila is fairly bad, as Ranger main she gets nearly nothing from her sub job other than Viking Lore. Her base res are super bad and with MR stats and no inbuild def pen she wont deal much damage either.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Ranger/Viking (only for atk buff)
Passiv 1: Ranger Lore
Passiv 2: Viking Lore
Reactive: Reflex

Name: Chel
Short Character Overview(WIP): Chel being a green mage main there is not a lot of use for her, the Job is really bad as a main job offering only Ruin and Imperil as usable abilities. With Haste and Quicken from Time mage sub she got some use in live PvP thanks to her very low cast time.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Time Mage
Passiv 1: Thief Lore
Passiv 2: Speed Cast
Reactive: Slow Counter

Name: Luartha
Short Character Overview(WIP): Luartha is the hardest hitting missle unit released so far, thanks to self-sacrifice and her double gunner buff she can deal devastating damage. additionally she got very strong slashres and can apply disable. she is farly squishy overall especially against magic, has height issues and no good reactive.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Gunner
Passiv 1: Self-Sacrifice
Passiv 2: Tune-Up
Reactive: Predictive Fire

Name: Kain
Short Character Overview(WIP): Kain is an amazing DPS, he got (tho fairly low values) def pen and pierce res reduction, disable and reduces enemys healing. His base res arent good, but not bad either, his biggest downside is low magic res.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Paladin
Passiv 1: Pride of the Dragoons
Passiv 2: Holy knights protection/ Viking Lore
Reactive: Paladins Guard

Name: Rosa
Short Character Overview(WIP): Rosa is kind of a support dps, she got plenty of strong healing aswell as protect and Shell to support allies. She also got Holy. She got the benefit of hybrid damage with her missle skills, which is also her biggest issue since they are physical and shes a magic based unit. Her base res are bad except for Magic.
Recommended Build:
Sub: White Mage
Passiv 1: Mag up lv1
Passiv 2: Deep Love/Blessing of Ice
Reactive: Dodge

Name: Cecil
Short Character Overview(WIP): Cecil, is a hard hitting character, with strong base slash and pierce res and some decent def with his passiv and selfbuff. He also got some ulitily with disable and atkbreak. A lot of his skills reduce his own HP and hes very vurnable to magic damage. Hes also lacking def or slashpen.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Soldier
Passiv 1: Self-Sacrifice
Passiv 2: Blood of the Lunarias
Reactive: Overcomer of Ordeals

Name: Skahal
Short Character Overview(WIP):
Skahal is mostly a stronger Mediena. He got extremly high Magic stats and good cast time.
Staff mage offers a 100% hit skill and a move/jump +1 buff. Time mage offers some utility with haste and quicken. He is very fragile.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Staffmage (Time mage only for manual)
Passiv 1: Mag up
Passiv 2: Mag up/def up/speed cast
Reactive: Anti-Barrier

Name: Ildyra
Short Character Overview(WIP): Ilydra is a amazing Unit. She got high damage on her instacast magic, aswell as strong heals. She is mostly played as a sub dps support. She is fairly weak against all damage types except for Magic.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Spellblade (only for resist magic)
Passiv 1: Mag up
Passiv 2: Level 4 to level 3
Reactive: Damage distribution

Name: Howlet
Short Character Overview(WIP): Howlet is a strong magic slash attacker. His main kit offers plenty of strong magic slash attacks, Redmage gives him cura, aerora and the strong Jamming Thrust. White mage offers some healing utility. He aint got any big defizits in his base resistence, but his kit offers no defensive buffs, his survival is relient on a good tank and his decent base HP.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Redmage/White Mage
Passiv 1: Wind-Enhancing Rune
Passiv 2: Sharp Mind
Reactive: Magic Commutation

Name: Fryevia
Short Character Overview(WIP): Fryevia is a Magic Tank. She got mediocre base resistence against most damage types, but high resistence against magic. She got some okay damage output with her decently high Magic and got some healing potential with White Mage sub, but this removes her potential to tank. She is an overall fairly weak UR.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Spellblade (tank), White Mage (not your primary tank)
Passiv 1: Providence of Wind
Passiv 2: Saviors protection / Emerald Echo
Reactive: Magic guard

Name: Lasswell
Short Character Overview(WIP): Lasswell is a hard hitting evasion Unit. His Mirage lets him tank one attack for free. He got potential to run Dragoon sub for a strong buff and pierce damage. He is really weak to magic.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Samurai/ Dragoon
Passiv 1: Blade Soul
Passiv 2: Atk up or Tranquil detachment
Reactive: Third eye

Name: Halloween Rairyuu
Master Ability Effect:
HP 10% for ally
15 earth atk for ally
20 slash resist pen for self
Short Character Overview(WIP):
Rairyuu got high damage and is deadly against Tanks with his spirit and slash pen.
He got decent tankyness thanks to Paladin sub and immortal spirit lets him survive lethal once.
Black mage sub offers the devastating Flare, but hes usally build for slash atk and blackmage offers no TP skills which makes paladin the preferable sub in most cases. His TMR gives a selfrevive which makes it one of the best TMR for now. He is weak to slash and Wind.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Paladin (BM in rare cases)
Passiv 1: Earth-Enhancing Rune, Sharp mind
Passiv 2: Mag up, Holy knights protection
Reactive: Magic Commutation (without Bell) / Paladins Guard (with bell)

Name: Knight of Ruin Sterne
Short Character Overview(WIP):
RSterne is one of the best evasion units alongside Vinera. 
He got extremly high damage and a instacast diamond aoe.
He even got good enough base tankyness and 20% base slash resist, making him able to be played in a bruiser comb. His biggest downside is extrem weaknes to magic and the fairly common skill 'holy'.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Samurai
Passiv 1: Desperation
Passiv 2: Blade Soul
Reactive: Dark Shadow (evasion Build) / Murderous Glare (none evasion)

Name: Halloween Little Leela
Master Ability Effect:
10%Wind HP for ally
15 Wind atk for ally
10 evasion for self
Short Character Overview(WIP):
Little Leela is one of the best support units we got.
Her Main job offers strong offensive abilitys aswell as strong heals without cast time. 
White Mage sub gives her Full-life and Curada. She can be played in evasion combs.
Recommended Build:
Sub: White Mage
Passiv 1: Level 4 to Level 3
Passiv 2: Shukuchi
Reactive: Damage Distribution

Name: Glaciela
Short Character Overview(WIP): Glaciela is a very strong DPS. She is super fast, got high atk and def pen, aswell as high range and a 100% hit skill to counter evasion. She got high slash res and decet pierce res, but is very fragile to magic and missle damage.
Recommended Build:
Sub : Valkyrie (Monk is rare cases)
Passiv 1: Jab Mastery 
Passiv 2: Shadow runner OR HP Up OR Shukuchi
Reactive: Counter Sting

Name: Agrias
Short Character Overview(WIP): Agrias might be the best tank. Her MA gives the attack res, He got high magic res and paladin sub gives her acces to a 50% physical barrier. She got access to disable, confusion, silence and stop which is insanely strong. She can deal some decent damage aswell.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Holy Knight
Support 1: Holy Knight's Protection (Max HP Up, DEF Up)
Support 2: Knight's Honor/ Chivalry 
Reaction: Defense (Chance of damage reduction when taking Damage)

Name: Delita
Short Character Overview(WIP): Delita got good attack and decent tankyness. He can reduce fire res, silence and inflict stop. Sadly his .very strong buff and his stop skill are on his sub so you'd have to sacrifice those to gain access to Paladin sub. He has no defpen and is very weak to magic.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Squire
Support 1: Holy Knight's protection
Support 2: Self- Sacrifice (Great Atk Up, All Attack Res Down) 
Reaction: Paladin's Guard (Chance of damage reduction when taking Physical Damage)

Name: Oldoa
Master Ability Effect:
Acquired AP +30%,
Slash, Pierce, Strike, Missile ATK Resistance +5
Short Character Overview(WIP): Oldoa got good atk, but Soldier is a mediocre attacking job, it offers high damage skills but reduces the users HP. Viking skill got high AP costs and Assassin are too low range. Her TMR is one of the best in the game giving AP and def pen to the user. She deals good damage but is extremly fragile.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Viking
Support 1: Viking Lore (Max HP/ Atk Up)
Support 2: Self- Sacrifice (Great Atk Up, All Attack Res Down) 
Reaction: Counter Slash (Chance of Counterattack when taking Physical Damage)

Name: Kilphe
Short Character Overview(WIP): Kilphe is one of the best magic units. She got very high physical res with her high def and physical barrier. She counters evasion with access to 2 100% hit skill and got some healing with White mage sub. Spellblade sub gives her high magic res and a magic barrier aswell as access to taunting blade which makes her able to be played as tank. Her damage isnt super high and shes fragile to pierce damage.
Recommended Build:
Sub: depending on playsytle 
Support 1: Magic Up Lv.1
Support 2: Defense Up/Providence of Lightning
Reaction: Anti-barrier (Chance of damage reduction when taking Damage)

Name: Warrior of Light
Short Character Overview(WIP): Warrior of Light is one of the best tanks. He got a TP hate skill, can inflict stop and reduce enemys atk/mag. He got high slashres and with Spellblade sub access to high magic res aswell. He is very fragile to pierce damage.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Light Warrior/Spellblade (dragoon in rare cases)
Support 1: Beginning Warrior (Max HP up, DEF Up)
Support 2: Providence of Dark: Magic ATK Res Up, Dark Res Up)
Reaction: Dragon's Blade

Name: Rain
Short Character Overview(WIP): Rain is the best magic tank. His high spirit and magic res lets him take nearly no damage from magic attacks. He can reduce fire res and build up high chains with his multi hit attack, which makes him amazing for Raid. Red mage sub gives him the very powerful long range jamming thrust, which in addition to his high magic stat makes him able to be play as a magic dps. He is very fragile to physical damage.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Red Mage/ Grandshelt Knight
Support 1: Spirit Up Lv.1/ HP UP Lv.1
Support 2: Intersifying Power (Magic Up, Enhance skills)
Reaction: Sword Guard (against physical)/Magic reflex(against magic)

Name: Vinera
Short Character Overview(WIP): Vinera is the best evasion Unit. She got high damage and with Dual Gunner sub some decent range attacks. Her high agi and high movement makes it hard for her to be played outside of evasion combs.
Recommended Build:
Sub: DualGunner
Support 1: Thief Lore ( Move+1, Agi Up)
Support 2: Tune-up (Agi Up, Def Penetration Up)
Reaction: Dark Shadow (Chance of raising own Evasion Rate for 3 turns when Taking damage (Stackable up to 3 times) & CT Up)

Name: Viktora
Short Character Overview(WIP): Viktora excels in fast casting long range Jump attacks, with the help of her Master ability. She got good mobility with her Main Job being Dragoon giving her 4 Jump and access to move 1+ from her Thief Sub. She can use Soldier sub for Hazard form to increase her damage, but she is very fragile.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Dragoon
Support 1: Self- Sacrifice (Great ATK Up, All Res Down)
Support 2: Thief Lore (Move+1, Agi Up)
Reaction: Dragon's Blade (Chance of Counterattack when taking Damage & absorbs Damage dealt)

Name: Lucia
Short Character Overview(WIP): Lucia is good dps. Sharing the same role and main job as Luartha she got lower dps than her, but a better reactive with Reflex and access to 100% hit Sharpshoot. Dual Gunner is very strong for chaining.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Ranger
Support 1: Ranger Lore (Range +1 & ACC UP)
Support 2: Tune-up (Agi Up, Defense Penetration Up)
Reaction: Reflex (Chance of evading all attacks)

Name: Miranda
Short Character Overview(WIP): Miranda is a bruiser. As Redmage main she got some decent damage and healing skills. Paladin gives her some nice def and time mage gives her a strong sub job with haste and quicken. She can be very strong with the right team, but Ildyra plays a simular role with a way stronger kit.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Time Mage
Support 1: Speed Cast (reduce Casttime)
Support 2: Holy Knight's Protection (Max HP Up, DEF Up)
Reaction: Paladins Guard (agaisnt physical)/ Magic reflex (against magic)

Name: Kitone
Short Character Overview(WIP): Kitone is the best Drain Force unit. She is fast, got decent evasion an fairly good atk. She suffers like many older DPS unit from no def pen and evasion is fairly easy to counter ith 100% hit skills. Outside of her Drain force niche shes not really played.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Soldier
Passiv 1: Shukuchi 
Passiv 2: Shadowrunner/self-sacrifice
Reaction: Slow Counter

Name: Whisper
Master Ability Effect:
Slash ATK +5,
All Attack Type Resistance +5
Short Character Overview(WIP): Whisper got 30% res to all attack types and can be build to 100% resist one or even two of them, she is very versatile in her tanking behavior but hard to pull of since, if shes build for Slash res and you hit a missle team her low base tankyness is a big issue. She excels against mono damage type teams and is worse than most other tanks against mixed damage. Her damage is terrible and she offers nearly no utility she is just there to tank.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Spellblade   
Passiv 1: HP Up Lv.1   
Passiv 2: Providence of Light    
Reactve: Sword Guard

Name: Orlandeau
Short Character Overview(WIP): Orlandeau got high atk and decently high hp. He got very high range with crush armor, he can reduce def and atk, silence and reduce lightning res. He can also increase allies evasion and selfhaste with his limit. He got no inbuild defpen and doesnt reduce slashres, hes also weak to magic and pierce, so hes slowly falling out of meta.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Samurai/Sword Saint
Support 1: Thunder God (Great ATK Up, All ATK Res Down)
Support 2: Blade Soul (ATk/Evasion Up, DEF down)
Reaction: Auto-Refresh (Chance of recovering AP when taking Damage)

Name: Ramza
Short Character Overview(WIP): Ramza is very versatile. He got decently high damage and decent base res, he got negative magic res, but spellblade sub negates this issue. He can reduce enemys atk/mag and buff his allies atk/mag, he can tank with taunting spell and has very good chain potential. Ramaza can do a lot but is not super good at any of it. He's just an okay unit.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Spellblade
Support 1: Shukuchi (Move/Jump +1)
Support 2: Shadow Runner (Agi/Luck Up)
Reaction: Counter Tackle/ Magic Guard

Name: Macherie (Winter)
Master Ability Effect:
20 ice res for self
20% agi for self
10 defpen for self
10% hp for fire ally
15 fire atk for fire ally
Short Character Overview(WIP): Machérie (Winter) is a decent Unit. She is very fast and got a good amount of atk.she only got 10 def pen but its better than nothing. She got high range with ranger sub and her jump attacks. She also has good slash and magic res, which are the most common damage types but suffers from bad strike and missle res.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Ranger
Support 1: Viking Lore (Max Hp/Atk Up)
Support 2: Focus (Cast time Down, Missile Atk Up)
Reaction: Reflex

Name: Ramada (Winter)
Master Ability Effect:
20 crit rate for self
30% atk for self
10% h for water ally
15 water atk for water ally
Short Character Overview(WIP): Ramada (Winter) is a better version of normal Sterne. She got high atk and good agility, compared to Sterne she also got better res and higher HP. But she still got the same problems. Her kit offers no utility and even with her better stats surviving is hard.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Ninja
Support 1: Shukuchi (Move/Jump +1)
Support 2: Self- Sacrifice (Great Atk Up, All Attack Res Down)
Reaction: Counter Slash (Chance of Counterattack when taking Physical Damage)

Name: Yerma
Short Character Overview(WIP): Yerma is a very valueable PvE Unit. Viking offers many hard hitting skills and thief sub gives her access to steal time. Her Limit reduces all attack resistence and increases her own. Her kit is very valueable for Raid. She got high atk and agi. For PvP she is lacking utility, Vikings Ap cost are way too high, also her base res are very bad.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Viking/Thief
Support 1: Viking Lore (Max HP/ Atk Up)
Support 2: Thief Lore (Move +1, Agi Up)
Reaction: Sword Guard (Chance of Damage reduction when taking Damage)

Name: Frederika
Short Character Overview(WIP): Frederika is very easy to raise because her shards are offered in Friendship coin shop. She got very high range access to 100% hit sharpshoot and the very strong diamond aoe barrage, additionally she got strong buffs and negative effects like disable. She is lacking defpen and only got medium damage. Highly recommended to raise her.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Gunner/ Ranger
Support 1: Shukuchi/ Shadow Runner
Support 2: Concentration/ Ranger Lore
Reaction: Reflex (Chance of evading all attacks)

Name: Sterne
Short Character Overview(WIP): Sterne is a very mediocre dps. He got high atk and good movement, but he lacks def pen and has AP problems. Ninja sub gives him high range with Shuriken and Dragoon gives him pierce damage. He got bad res values and low hp. He can chain well with the high meta dark units Ruin Sterne and Kain.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Ninja 
Support 1: Shukuchi (Move/Jump +1) 
Support 2: Self- Sacrifice (Great Atk Up, All Attack Res Down) 
Reaction: Counter Slash (Chance of Counterattack when taking Physical Damage)

Name: Gilgamesh
Master Ability Effect:
Speed +10%, Slash ATK +10
Level 80: HP +1000, Accuracy +15
Short Character Overview(WIP): Gilgamesh is the only unit so far to reduce slash res. He got can selfhaste and buff with a 50% damage redcution shield for 3 hits. He is one of the few units with a diamond aoe and the only one with hybrid damage. He works well in almost every slash team, he got decent damage and can be played wth time mage sub for quicken in manaul PvP. He highly relies on his damage reduction shield to survive since his base res are terrible also his damage isnt high enough to be played as solo dps.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Soldier/ Time mage
Support 1: Self-Sacrifice
Support 2: whatever you need
Reaction: Clairvoyant Blade

Name: Ayaka
Short Character Overview(WIP): Ayaka is on of the best support units in the Game. She got high mag% which allows for very strong heals, fulllife to revive a fainted ally with full hp and 100% hit holy to counter evasion units. Time Mage sub gives her access to Comet for some extra damage aswell as one of the best buffs haste to buff your allies. Her limit is a very strong diamond aoe instacast heal, which also removes stop and gives immunity to it.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Time Mage
Support 1: Speed Cast (Cast Time Down)
Support 2: Null CT Change
Reaction: Slow Counter

Name: Mediena
Short Character Overview(WIP): Mediena is a free unit and highly recommended for new player as farmer. She got high starting AP aswell as high Mag stats and very good agility. She is one of the best options for PvE and Multi quests. Blackmage is a bad PvP job with high cast time, greenmage got very niche usage and Ninja only offers some TP skills for long fights and the strong passivs. She is extremly fragile and dies to almost everything one hit. No go for auto PvP, niche usage in manual PvP.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Black Mage/ Green Mage
Support 1: MAG Up Lv.1
Support 2: Shukuchi / Shadow runner
Reaction: Magic Counter (Chance of Magic Counterattack when taking Damage)

Name: Macherie
Short Character Overview(WIP): Machérie is the best example of a bad Unit. Cleric is a really underwhelming class which offers only Banish and cure as decent skills. Monk gives her nothing usefull at all. Blackmage sub at least gives her Banishra and Banishga to support her fairly high mag stat, but she doesnt get access to Blackmages best skill 'Flare'. Her Limit is completly useless. Shes only worth raising for some Niche use in Tower and to get her really strong TMR.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Black Mage
Support 1: MAG Up Lv.1
Support 2: HP Up Lv.1
Reaction: Magic Counter (Chance of Magic Counterattack when taking Damage)

Name: Oelde
Short Character Overview(WIP): Oelde is a decent DPS. He got high crit chance and good Patk, allows him to murder everything in his range, which is also his main flaw, his really low range, in addition to bad movement. He also got low survivability. He eighter needs to run in an Evasion comb, highly relying on luck or cast his Limit for damage reduction. He is very hard to be played effectiv.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Lancer/ Samurai
Support 1: Blade Soul (ATK/Evasion Rate Up & DEF down)
Support 2: Deadly Mastery/ Pierce Mastery
Reaction: Counter Thrust / Third Eye

Name: Aileen
Short Character Overview(WIP): Aileen, is one of the worst UR units. She got high atk, but Lancer is a bad Main job with weak utility and low range skills. She has no def pen, low hp and bad overall res values. She can be fairly usefull for PvE, but is very bad in PvP.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Lancer
Support 1: Self-Sacrifice (Great ATK Up & All ATK Res Down)
Support 2: Deadly Mastery/ Pierce mastery 
Reaction: Counter Thrust (Chance of Counterattack when taking Physical Damage)

Name: Robb
Short Character Overview(WIP): Robb is a very underwhelming UR, he is fast and got decently high atk, but hes missing def pen and dies very easily. Samurai is a very underwhelming main job the strong buffs are in the sub, so he can use his other jobs as sub or has to sacrifice his buffs.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Lancer/ Samurai
Support 1: Self-Sacrifice (Great ATK Up & All ATK Res Down)
Support 2: Blade Soul (ATK/Evasion Rate Up & DEF down)
Reaction: Third Eye

Name: Engelbert
Short Character Overview(WIP): Engelbert is one of the better normal pool tanks. He got extremly high HP, very high def and overall good res values. Do to his very high luck he can be build as evasion tank. He is very slow and very fragile to magic damage.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Paladin
Support 1: Holy Knight's Protection (Max HP Up, DEF Up)
Support 2: HP up Lv.1
Reaction: Sword Guard (Chance of damage reduction when taking Damage)

Name: Xiza
Short Character Overview(WIP): Xizas main use is in  manual PvP with her high agility and Thiefs 'steal heart'. Monks 'Pummel' and Thiefs 'Steal time' make her very strong for chain building. Her TMR is the best in the game. giving 25% AP regen per turn, for 3 turns in addition to the very valueable 7 agi it provides. She is highly recommended to build for the TMR.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Thief
Support 1: Strike Mastery / HP UP Lv1
Support 2: Thief Lore (Move +1, Agi Up)
Reaction: Fist Counter / Quick Action

Name: Thancred
Short Character Overview(WIP): Thancred got very high hp aswell as good slashres, missle res and insanely good strike res. He got decent damage and with Dragoon sub access to slash aswell as pierce damage. Hes lacking utility and got extremly bad magic res.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Dragoon
Support 1: HP UP Lv1
Support 2: whatever you need
Reaction: Dragon's Blade (recommended), Magic reflex (when facing magic)

Name: Mustadio
Master Ability Effect:
Accuracy +30
Increase the chance of Blind/ Doom/ Disable statuses
Short Character Overview(WIP): Very good range attacker. His MA and TMR is very good against evasion characters. He can also cause many statuses and thanks to his MA, they have higher chance of landing. All sub jobs are useful, Thief sub can cause many statuses but requires him to move in close, which is not really recommended.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Machinist/ Ranger
Support 1: Aim (Jump/Range +1)
Support 2: Thief Lore (Move +1, Agi Up)
Reaction: Reflex (Chance of evading all attacks)

Name: Raviesse
Short Character Overview(WIP): Has an excellent Master Ability. Can be built as an evasion tank with Thief Lore, Blade Soul and Third Eye Combo. When used as tank, Taunting Blade is cheaper to use because of MA. When used as a Tanky debuffer (with Thief Sub), she can Steal Heart/ Steal Time. Beware that she would need high Faith for debuffs to land, thus increasing Magic Damage taken.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Paladin/Thief
Support 1: Holy Knight's Protection (Max HP Up, DEF Up)
Support 2: Thief Lore (Move +1, Agi Up)
Reaction: Paladin's Guard (Chance of damage reduction when taking Physical Damage)

Name: Seymore
Short Character Overview(WIP): Seymore is only good if you got his VC (not on Global yet), he gets a lot of damage from it which makes him fairly usable. Samurai and thief support his evasion character and Viking gives him soem high scaling attacks.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Thief
Support 1: Viking Lore (Max HP/ Atk Up)
Support 2: Thief Lore (Move +1, Agi Up)
Reaction: Quick Action (Chance of significantly raising own Agility for 1 turn after taking damage)

Name: Dario
Short Character Overview(WIP): Dario is the best MR Tank, his MA alongside Paladins passiv gives him a lot of free resistance. Ninjas Shukuchi gives him the much needed mobility to run ahead as frontline and take enemys aggro.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Paladin/ Spellblade
Support 1: Holy Knight's Protection (Max HP Up, DEF Up)
Support 2: Shukuchi (Move/Jump +1)
Reaction: Paladin's Guard (Chance of damage reduction when taking Physical Damage)

Name: Tyrell
Short Character Overview(WIP): Tyrell is a decent free Unit, His MA and passivs give him a lot of HP and allow him to take some hits, while Viking subs high modifier give him some decent damage output. Knight main gives access to the strong trinity break. He suffers from really high AP cost and low mobility
Recommended Build:
Sub: Viking
Support 1: Viking Lore (Max HP/ Atk Up)
Support 2: HP Up Lv.1
Reaction: Sword Guard (Chance of Damage reduction when taking Damage)

Name: Salire
Short Character Overview(WIP): Salire is basically the MR version of Mediena, her MA allows her to reach high Mag. She can cast Thunder and none element magic with Blackmage and thanks to White Mage she gets the really powerful light magic attack Holy. The Ninja passive gives her good mobility. Overall one of the best MR Units.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Black Mage/ White Mage
Support 1: MAG Up Lv.1
Support 2: Shukuchi/ Shadow Runner
Reaction: Magic Counter (Chance of Magic Counterattack when taking Damage)

Name: Adelard
Short Character Overview(WIP): Adelard is one of the best MR units. He can deal decent damage with Jamming thrust and got acces to a lot of healing skills with white mage. Green mage also got some very niche usage. he got fairly good res values overall and with his passiv he negates his magic weakness. His TMR is the best weapon for himself and Miranda.
Recommended Build:
Sub: White Mage
Support 1: Savior's Protection
Support 2: Mage's Protection (Increase Magic ATK Res)
Reaction: Magic Reflex

Name: Dorando
Short Character Overview(WIP): Viking gives him some nice damaging Skill and his MA and Passiv gives him some reasonable HP and with Gunner sub he also gets some nice buffs for his Team. He is really slow, with low mobility.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Gunner
Support 1: Viking Lore (Max HP/Atk Up)
Support 2: HP Up Lv.1 
Reaction: Counter Shot (Chance of countertattack when taking damage)

Name: Gaffgarion
Short Character Overview(WIP): Gaffgarion is a strong free unit. He deals great damage, but has no survivability. Hes bad for PvP because of his not existing tankyness, but with carefull use amazing for PvE.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Fell Knight / Warrior
Support 1: Self-Sacrifice (Great Atk Up, All ATK Res Down)
Support 2: Atk Up Lv.1
Reaction: Old Mercenary (Chance of counterattack when taking damage and absorbing the damage done)

Name: Etre
Short Character Overview(WIP): Etre suffer hard from her extremly underwhelming jobs, as Monk main she got almost no attacking moves. Cleric offers nothing to support her and Knight sub adds a different damage type. she got some Chain potential and decent mobility, her TMR is also decent for the 3 agi it offers. other than that she got low tankyness and no damage.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Monk
Support 1: Strike Mastery (Strike Atk Up)
Support 2: HP Up Lv.1
Reaction: Fist Counter (Chance of Counterattack when taking Physical damage)

Name: Nasha
Short Character Overview(WIP): Nasha is a fairly decent Tank. she got high amounts of HP and a good combination of Passiv and Reactive. She can potentially run White mage sub for some healing, but looses the ability to generate hate. He low agi and mobility make it hard for her to access the frontline.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Paladin/White Mage
Support 1: Holy Knight's Protection (Max HP Up, DEF Up)
Support 2: HP up Lv.1
Reaction: Paladin's Guard (Chance of damage reduction when taking Physical Damage)

Name: Shadowlynx
Short Character Overview(WIP): Shadowlynx is one of the most mobile Units in this game. She can reach 6 move and 6 Jump roaming around the map without effort. She got decently high atk, can stop the enemy and increas the Evade of herself and allies. Shes very squishy and only her high Evade gives her some fake tankyness. Shes also good for Chains.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Samurai/ Ninja
Support 1: Shadow Runner (Agi/Luck Up)
Support 2: Blade Soul (Atk/Evasion UP, DEF Down)
Reaction: Third Eye (Chance of raising own Evasion Rate for 3 turns when taking Damage (stackable up to 3 times))

Name: Mont
Short Character Overview(WIP): Mont is the go to Tank for everyone, he can reach high HP stats and even deal some decent damage. Hes really easy and cheap to max out, cuz his shards are available for Gil is the Shop. His Knight Sub gives him access to some debuffs, but his Paladin sub is usally recommended to generate Hate and maintain enemys focus.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Paladin
Support 1: Holy Knight's Protection (Max HP Up, DEF Up)
Support 2: Crown Prince of Leonis (Atk Up)
Reaction: Sword Guard

Name: YShtola
Short Character Overview(WIP): Y'shtola is a fairly usable Free Unit, shes easy to max out and can be a decent farmer thanks to her diamond aoe. She can deal some good damage but suffers from REALLY bad Tankyness and movement. She can use White mage sub for some healing and Holy or Greenmage for some mediocre buffs and the fairly stong no element ruin.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Sorceress/ White Mage
Support 1: Enochian (Mag Up)
Support 2: Savior's Protection (Debuff Res/ Magic ATK Res Up)
Reaction: Manafont (Chance of recovering own AP when taking Damage)

Name: Owe
Short Character Overview(WIP): Owe is a mediocre Physical Attacker. He can increase you partys Bravery and Evasion, and got some ranged damage with Hien. Ninja Sub further increases his ranged damage potential and increases his mobility. He naturally really squishy.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Ninja
Support 1: Blade Soul (Atk/Evasion Up, DEF down)
Support 2: Shukuchi (Move/Jump +1)
Reaction: Third Eye (Chance of raising own Evasion Rate for 3 turns when taking Damage (Stackable up to 3 times)

Name: Marguerite
Short Character Overview(WIP): Margritte got 3 strong magic jobs but sadly the worst of it. Time mage as main job is bad since haste is on her sub and quicken is bad for auto. Blackmage isnt really ideal because of the high cast times and her red mage is missing the best skill Jamming thrust. She could've been super strong but Gumi decided against it.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Time Mage/ Red Mage
Support 1: Magic Up Lv.1
Support 2: Swift Cast
Reaction: Magic Reflex

Name: Grace
Short Character Overview(WIP): Grace is the best MR healer so far and thats also all she does, healing her allies, she got some minor buffs with Shell and Protest which usally arent advised to enable for auto battles since she can get stuck buffing herself forever. She got amazing res values, she is one of the few MR units worth building.
Recommended Build:
Sub: White Mage
Support 1: Emerald Echo (Increase effect duration of Buff/Debuff cast by self by 1 turn)
Support 2: Savior's Protection (Debuff Res/ Magic ATK Res Up)
Reaction: Regenerator (Chance of bestowing Regen on self for 3 turns when taking Damage)

Name: Cadia
Short Character Overview(WIP): Cadia is what Macherie wishes she would be. She can cleanse debuffs and be a fairly decent healer. A nice overall support. She also got decent resistance against magic damage, but overall not worth raising since Grace is just better.
Recommended Build:
Sub: White Mage
Support 1: Spirit Up Lv.1 
Support 2: Providence of Earth (Earth Res/ Magic ATK Res Up)
Reaction: Regenerator (Chance of bestowing Regen on self for 3 turns when taking Damage)

Name: Ramada
Short Character Overview(WIP): Ramada can work well in the beginning of the game thanks to early access to 'Nighthawk'. She can get a fair amount of Pierce attack and thanks to Thief Lore she got nice mobility. For harder content she lacks damage and Tankyness, but can be used for mug and steal time.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Lancer
Support 1: Pierce Mastery ( Pierce ATK Up)
Support 2: Thief Lore ( Move +1, Agi Up)
Reaction: Counter Thrust (Chance of Counterattack when taking Physical Damage & Piercing)

Name: Vistralle
Short Character Overview(WIP): Vistralle is the best Main Thief (until a UR Thief gets released), He can Mug, Steal Heart, Steal time and all that usefull Thief stuff. His sub jobs offer nearly nothing usefull other than maybe some passivs. Because Thief requires high faith hes vurnable to all kinds of damage and relies on Evasion to survive. Hes nothing amazing, but if you need everything a Thief can offer, he is you best bet.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Thief
Support 1: Self Sacrifice ( Great Atk Up, All ATK Res Down)
Support 2: Thief Lore (Move +1, Agi Up)
Reaction: Magic reflex

Name: Khury
Short Character Overview(WIP): Khury makes use of his range to as Ranger and use high ground to his advantage. His Ma gives him good AP economy and Dragoon sub allows some jump attacks. he got low HP and low damage and mixed pierce and missle damage doesnt help him a lot.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Dragoon
Support 1: Focus (Cast time Down, Missile Atk Up)
Support 2: Ranger Lore ( Range +1, Accurace Up)
Reaction: Reflex (Chance of evading all attacks)

Name: Schuzelt
Short Character Overview(WIP): Schuzelt is the MR Unit with the Highest ATK. His Hazard Form skill gives him a great boost in damage and acces to Ranger sub gives him the potential to kill the enemys out of save distance. Hes fairly usable, but got low mobility and no tankyness.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Ranger
Support 1: Self-Sacrifice ( Great Atk Up, All ATK Res Down)
Support 2: Ranger Lore ( Range +1, Accurace Up)
Reaction: Reflex (Chance of evading all attacks)

Name: Fina
Short Character Overview(WIP): Fina is the go to choice for faith raising. She can support your allies with heals and buffs and deal some minor damage with Gunner Sub. Really only usefull to raise faith while auto farming.
Recommended Build:
Sub: White Mage of Lapis
Support 1: Innocent Shooter (Range +1, Magic Up)
Support 2: Secret of Shooting (Missle Atk Up)
Reaction: Counter Shot (Chance of counterattack when taking damage)

Name: Helena
Short Character Overview(WIP): Helenas biggest problem is Green mage as Main job, this Job offers nearly nothing usefull other than Ruin and emerald Echo. Her sub Job on the other hand are really strong. Time mage sub helps her teammates to cycle thru a lot of turns and White mage sub makes her a great healer.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Time Mage
Support 1: Emerald Echo (Increase effect duration of Buff/Debuff cast by self by 1 turn)
Support 2: Speed Cast (Cast Time Down)
Reaction: Slow Counter (Chance of inflicting Slow on target for 3 turns when taking Damage)

Name: Meriluke
Short Character Overview(WIP): Meriluke got a good MA, but her Job combination doesnt support this at all, monk as main job offers almost no attacking moves, greenmage is useless for her and knight got some decent debuffs but doesnt offer a lot of damage potential. pummel makes her usable for chains, but shes just not worth any investment.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Monk
Support 1: Strike Mastery (Strike Atk Up)
Support 2: HP Up Lv.1
Reaction: Fist Counter (Chance of Counterattack when taking Physical damage)

Name: Rairyuu
Short Character Overview(WIP): Rairyuu is good Unit for new Player. His high range makes him really easy to use. also Thief lore gives him nice mobility to stay out of enemys range, since he got no tankyness at all.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Gunner
Support 1: Thief Lore (Move +1, 12% AGI)
Support 2: Concentration (Range +2, Evasion Down)
Reaction: Quick Action (Chance of significantly raising own Agility for 1 turn after taking damage)

Name: Lilyth
Short Character Overview(WIP): Lilyth is fairly simular to Schuzelt with less atk, she makes use of her Ranger sub for some long range attacks and got some debuffs with her Knight main. She's usable, nothing super amazing.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Ranger
Support 1: Self-Sacrifice ( Great Atk Up, All ATK Res Down)
Support 2: Ranger Lore ( Range +1, Accurace Up)
Reaction: Reflex (Chance of evading all attacks)

Name: Lorenzo
Short Character Overview(WIP): Lorenzo is a bruiser type, he gets fairly tanky, he can use Jump attack with his Dragoon job, or get some medium range attacks with Lancer as sub. He could also use Time mage as Sub to support his allies with Haste and quicken, but this requires to raise his faith. Remember speed cast also reduces his Jumps cast time.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Lancer/Time mage 
Support 1: Pierce Mastery / HP UP LV1
Support 2: HP UP Lv1/ Speed Cast 
Reaction: Dragon's Blade (Chance of Counterattack when taking Damage & absorbs Damage dealt)

Name: Phoebe
Short Character Overview(WIP): Best SR Unit in game, even better then some MR Unit. Very good mobility and speed for a support. Has Haste and Quick and Healing spell. Good at manipulating turn of Allies and Enemy. Extremely good TMR for a SR.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Time Mage
Support 1: Speed Cast (Cast Time Down)
Support 2: Jump +1 / HP Up LV.1
Reaction: Slow Counter (Chance of inflicting Slow on target for 3 turns when taking Damage)

Name: Little Leela
Short Character Overview(WIP): Somewhat tanky mostly against magic damage, with some healing potenial. Mostly just a budget Freyvia.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Spellblade
Support 1: Providence of Light (Magic ATK Res/ Light Res Up)
Support 2: HP Up Lv.1
Reaction: Sworld Guard (Chance of Damage reduction when taking Damage)

Name: Murmur
Short Character Overview(WIP): Shes an okay Magic dps,and can reach 100 Magic res (mostly for the memes) she is fairly usable for a SR. Low overall base stats.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Black Mage
Support 1: Mag Up Lv.1
Support 2:Initial AP Up Lv.1
Reaction: Magic Counter (Chance of Magic Counterattack when taking Damage)

Name: Baelo
Short Character Overview(WIP): Poor Man's Engelbert. He is a worse tank than Mont is everyway with the same element. So not sure if there is any reason to raise him. Don't think there is a content that requires 2 Earth tanks, but only then he might be useful (still questionable). He has some decent breaks from his Knight job, especial "Trinity break" and that's it.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Paladin
Support 1: Holy Knight's Protection (Max HP Up, DEF Up)
Support 2: HP up Lv.1
Reaction: Sword Guard (Chance of damage reduction when taking Damage)

Name: Socia
Short Character Overview(WIP): With Jump 4, she can reach high ground and use her Ranger skills to Attack enemy from afar. Her jump attacks also deal decent damage. She's usable, but overall below average stats maker her hard to use.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Ranger
Support 1: Atk Up Lv.1
Support 2: HP UP Lv1 / Ranger Lore 
Reaction: Reflex (Chance of evading all attacks)

Name: Vallaide
Short Character Overview(WIP): Simular to Helena he suffer from a poor Main Job, but White mage and Red mage sub give him some well needed utility. White mage gives him some good healing and also full-life to revive a dead allie. Red mage gives some minor healing, minor damage and fastcast to support allied caster. He is usable, but suffer from low basestats.
Recommended Build:
Sub: White Mage/Red Mage
Support 1: Initial AP Up Lv.1
Support 2: Emerald Echo (Increase effect duration of Buff/Debuff cast by self by 1 turn)
Reaction: Regenerator (Chance of bestowing Regen on self for 3 turns when taking damage)

Name: Surjes
Short Character Overview(WIP): Lancer is a weak main Job, Cleric is beyond useless and Paladin as Lancer only offers the Passiv and reactive. As damage dealer main class he got no damage, His MA doesnt support his kit. Hes a tragic victim of bad design.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Paladin
Support 1: Holy Knight's Protection (Max HP Up, DEF Up)
Support 2: Pierce Mastery (Pierce Atk Up)
Reaction: Counter Thrust (Chance of Counterattack when taking Physical Damage, Piercing)

Name: Vadim
Short Character Overview(WIP): Can be used as item collector with steal and Mug, also Steal Time and Steal heart are really usefull skills. His stats are really lackluster hes basically just a cheaper Vistralle or a more expensive Mia.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Samurai
Support 1: Thief Lore (Move +1, Agi Up)
Support 2: Acquired AP Up Lv.1
Reaction: Third Eye (Chance of raising Evasion Rate for 3 turns when taking Damage (Stackable up to 3 times))

Name: Yuni
Master Ability Effect:
HP +30%, 
Slash, Pierce, Strike, Missile ATK Resistance +10
Short Character Overview(WIP): A Tank Ranger, bad job combination, low base stats, avoid her.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Ranger
Support 1: Focus (Cast Time Down, Missile Atk Up) 
Support 2: Ranger Lore ( Range +1, Accurace Up)
Reaction: Reflex (Chance of evading all attacks)

Name: Naiah
Short Character Overview(WIP): One of the most useful SR, with an amazing MA. She can serve as a good Healer/support. Red Mage sub brings some damage. Her ability board gives her permanent +1 move which is awesome. A very cheap to build healer. She is extremly fragile with her SR basestats.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Red Mage
Passiv 1: Just use whatever you need none are outstanding
Passiv 2: SPR UP & Mage's protection are my overall recommendations
Reactive: Regenerator for Tower otherwise Magic reflex

Name: Severo
Short Character Overview(WIP): Blackmage is a decent job and Redmage adds some extra utility. He suffers from low SR base stats, but other than that hes a fairly usable unit.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Red Mage
Support 1: MAG Up Lv.1
Support 2: Initial AP Up Lv.1 / HP UP Lv1
Reaction: Magic Counter (Chance of Magic Counterattack when taking Damage)

Name: Learte
Short Character Overview(WIP): Shes a pure Ranger, her sub jobs offer nearly nothing, she dont got enough stats to be usable a Ranger and her magic is even worse so white mage sub does nothing eighter. Just dont build her.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Ranger
Support 1: Focus / deadly mastery
Support 2: Ranger Lore ( Range +1, Accurace Up)
Reaction: Reflex (Chance of evading all attacks)

Name: Miche
Short Character Overview(WIP): Miche got extremly fast cast time, amazing passivs and one of the best reactives in the game. Problem is those base stats are so beyond bad.. .
Recommended Build:
Sub: Black Mage
Support 1: MAG Up Lv.1
Support 2: Thief Lore (Move +1, Agi Up)
Reaction: Reflex (Chance of evading all attacks)

Name: Mia
Short Character Overview(WIP): Mia can be used as an item collector with steal and mug and also got some nice utility with Steal Heart and Steal time. Other than that her stats are garbage, so raise her at your own risk.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Thief
Support 1: Acquired AP Up Lv.1
Support 2: Thief Lore (Move +1, Agi Up)
Reaction: Quick Action (Chance of significantly raising own Agility for 1 turn after taking damage)

Name: Zazan
Short Character Overview(WIP): Zazan is mostly a meme, he got extremly high mobility and access to Steal time and Steal heart which actually makes him usable. But other than that his stats are extremly lackluster.
Recommended Build:
Sub: Thief
Support 1: HP UP Lv1 / ATK UP Lv1
Support 2: Thief Lore (Move +1, Agi Up)
Reaction: Sword Guard
